title: @Meddler Your season sucks. I can help you fix it.
body:
The last time these boards mattered was never. They suck. That's just a blunt truth. This is just reddit with maybe 1/5 the audience and no Riot attention. The last time anyone cared about leagueoflegends.com was when I had my post with GC like 3 RAINBOW years ago in the pre-board era. I, like most sane people, ditched once it become clear that Riot was trying to shut down negative communication. Unfortunately that seems to have backfired most spectacularly. Much like IT workers I'm never appreciated when things are working, and when shit hits the fan I'm supposed to be there. I wasn't. So really this entire bullshit meta is on me. 

_I have replaced every instance of the word "fuck" with "RAINBOW" because I think the boards are heavily moderated now. You know, for all the nobody that visit._

WHEN THE WORLD NEEDED ME MOST I DISAPPEARED. I'M BACK. You won't listen but I'm here anyway.

Now normally I'd have to make my posts ragey to get attention to them and so they wouldn't be ignored, but in this case RAINBOW your stupid meta. RAINBOW your decisions in S5 and S6, RAINBOW your inability to fix anything, and RAINBOW the fact that it has taken you this long to start to try to fix this shit.

**Lets begin with tanks.** RAINBOW tanks. Nobody has fun playing tanks, and nobody has fun playing against tanks. This isn't S4 tanks where they do damage and tank a lot, this isn't S3 tanks where they soak up damage. This isn't S2 tanks where nobody cares cause tanks suck. "Tanks" are pretty much a new concept to S5 and S6. Shyvana/Mundo S4 "tanks" were actually just bruisers. You know what's awesome about bruisers? They don't CC you for 5 years, building CDR just to CC you longer. They have to build damage to remain relevant (or in Mundo's case hurt himself, and therefore be far less tanky than a tank.) Most importantly, bruisers aren't Maokai. RAINBOW Maokai. Stop pushing Maokai he's a bullshit champion with bullshit abilities that makes the game worse for everyone. 

**RAINBOW tanks.** Bring back bruisers. Bruisers kept us safe from tanks, now tanks are killing bruisers. I'll tell you WHY though:

* Sunfire is a stupid generalist item that should never be more powerful than specialized items. 
* IBG is way too god damn powerful with it's slow field that slows me from my house all the way from runeterra. 
* Both these items are too RAINBOW cheap and are completed before anyone has time to even respond to them. Their stats aren't even out of line, 6 item tanks are not OP, they're just completed too damn quick. 
* WHY IN RAINBOW NAME WAS THORNMAIL CHANGED TO AN ANTI-BRUISER ITEM? WHO THOUGHT THIS WAS A GOOD IDEA? WHO THOUGHT TANKS BEATING BRUISERS WAS A GOOD IDEA? Jesus christ Riot.

Change thornmail back to being an anti-ADC item. Stop tanks from AFKing and killing bruisers because bruisers murder themselves on the thornmail damage return. Increase the cost of sunfire and IBG. I mean sweet jesus in S1 it took 3 months for Riot to respond to the sunfire meta and that was considered obscene. THIS HAS BEEN ALL OF S6. And you know what? It feels like TWO seasons because tanks ARE JUST THAT UNFUN.

**Ekko**: Stop being idiots and nerf his mobility. Kassadin doesn't build tank because if he presses R too much it takes twelve billion mana and he can't do it anymore. Ekko doesn't have that concept. He's too RAINBOW mobile. He always hits his combo and then escapes, and you can't do jack shit to stop it. Bruisers can never lock him down to actually hurt him, and if you ever actually land damage he just Rs for a massive RAINBOW nuke+heal and you die. His passive is an insult to god because you did something that even god himself would never dare do. And dear god if you're an ADC you now know what it's like to play against Kalista as a melee champion. EXCEPT JACKED UP TO 11 CAUSE HE'S A LITTLE SHIT. 

**Maokai**: Remove him from the game or halve his damage. How stubborn do you guys have to be to continue to allow the existence of a lane bully tank that has a 2 second invulnerable frame root that isn't even on a skill shot? 2 second hard CC root, 0.5 second AoE knockback on a 5 second CD Q. 20% damage mitigation that you have no counterplay against that also does a huge nuke back to you. And then his passive heals him as he continues to keep using W and Q to prevent any sort of good focus fire on him. Just stop Riot. He's dumb as RAINBOW to play literally just pressing W and Q repeatedly until you win the team fight, and he's dumb as RAINBOW to play against just pressing W and Q until you lose the team fight CAUSE HE HAS NO COUNTERPLAY. 

**Rageblade:** YOU'RE NERFING RAGEBLADE? WHAT IS THE MATTER WITH YOU? ARE YOU JUST SO OUT OF THE LOOP THAT YOU THINK PEOPLE ARE BUILDING THIS? We're in a tank + ADC meta and your response IS TO NERF RAINBOW BRUISERS? After 6 years of nerfing bruisers have you guys seriously never learned to do anything other than nerf bruisers? Yes I'm sure nerfing Rageblade is going to stop the tank+ADC meta. OH WAIT, you're actually buffing it on ADCs and nerfing it on melee. Cause you know, melee that build damage are so RAINBOW meta right now. And I'm sure Kog won't be a balance problem for the fifteenth time.  No THIS time you're going to tune him properly. THIS time it's going to work. 

**Ryze:** Stop RAINBOW reworking Ryze and rework Yorick you biased as RAINBOW developers. This is like a meme come to life at this point. I don't even have anything to say because the joke is just there. The joke is become reality. 

Stop being stupid about everything. YES OBVIOUSLY the champions you nerfed cause of Sated Devourer are going to be too weak after you remove Sated Devourer. You don't need data to show that. YES OBVIOUSLY nerfing rageblade when bruisers are at an all time low will seriously impact their ability to even be played ironically. Yes when you nerf every single tank item EXCEPT sunfire then sunfire will be the chosen item. Yes when you nerf every mobility item obtainable Olaf will have a plummeting winrate. This is your job for chrissake. 

STOP REWORKING CHAMPIONS YOU KNOW YOU WILL OBLITERATE LATER. Cancel the Ryze rework, massively nerf him, and forget about him until you do about 50 other reworks. Do the same thing to Nidalee. Remember when you did that to yorick FOUR YEARS AGO? Remember when you jacked the RAINBOW out of Jax's base stats TWO YEARS AGO and he has never recovered (oh wait, he sorta did with rageblade BUT GOOD THING WE'RE NERFING THAT!) How many juggernauts are viable right now? RAINBOW ZERO. Oh what's that, you wasted time reworking Skarner without bothering to touch his ultimate even though you know god damn well his ult will make him OP at low ELO? Wait what's that, YOU BUFFED HIS ULTIMATE? RAINBOW HELL RIOT.

Phantom Dancer is stupid. Graves running around with 12% movespeed and 12% damage reduction just makes him a ranged-kite-bruiser. Say that out loud and try not to vomit. Oh wait, with warlords he's a ranged-kite-bruiser-drain tank OH GOD I CAN'T HOLD IN MY PUKE.

Give me back my yellow ward upgrade so I can properly ward for my split push. RAINBOW.

Buff ghost if you're going to remove distortion, since you balanced ghost around distortion. Am I getting paid for this?

Buff BotRK and BC on at least melee champions so they have some viable options on how to play against tanks SINCE THEY ALL JUST GET THORNMAIL ANYWAY. 

**STOP CHANGING EVERY RAINBOW ITEM IN TO AN ADC ITEM!** You pushed BotRK REALLY RAINBOW HARD for ADCs then nerfed it hard cause every ADC was building it. WELL GEE, I wonder if on-hits are stronger on ranged champ- yup I just got hit in the face with a frying pan because that's too stupid to even ask. We figured this out 12 years ago and you guys are STILL surprised when on-hit items are stronger on ranged champions. It's like every time you guys do on-hits it's like "WHAT ITS STRONGER ON RANGED CHAMPIONS? HOW COULD WE HAVE KNOWN!"

**AND STOP PRETENDING THAT FORCING RANGED CHAMPIONS TOP IS EVER FUN.** Fighting ranged top laners will never be fun. NEVER. Stop forcing it. Top lane is the 1v1 lane where two many men fight each other. NOT BITCH ASS LISSANDRA SPAMS Q ALL DAY UNTIL YOU SHOOT YOURSELF.

**Give bruisers their itemization back.** Make Maw a bruiser item again. Make Sterakk's a bruiser item again. Stop changing rageblade in to an ADC item. Make BotRK in to a bruiser item again. I mean sweet jesus the only bruiser items right now are Titanic and Rageblade, you're making rageblade an ADC item and you overnerfed Titanic. What do you even want bruisers to build? Frozen Mallet? Cause you guys nerfed that back in S3 if you forgot.

**Give Titanic Hydra a buff**, are you guys just RAINBOW with me at this point? You remove FIFTEEN DAMAGE and you're like "oh gee willickers it seems everyone is playing a tank now! How entirely unexpected!" Don't people pay you to know this stuff? You nerf BotRK, BC, Titanic, you make rageblade the only viable option for bruisers even though it sandbags your entire laning phase and you can't possible comprehend why everyone swapped to tanks? 

Go in to the LoL client and sort champions by Role. You notice how the fighter role is blatantly the biggest? You notice how fighters are shit right now? You might begin to understand my frustation!

Now that said, this meta does suck but they ARE trying to fix it. Have you even read the PBE lately? They are buffing black cleaver, nerfing sun fire cape to be in line with randuins and dead mans plate. Deaths dance got buffed this season and is actually decent on bruisers. High Elo rivens in Korea build it every game. Bruisers suck right now but they riot is slowly trying to fix that.

Sun fire in its current state is actually because people were claiming "sun fire costs too much for when I can just get dead mans". People for the most part do not know what they are talking about. Sure, you are well versed in this game. But that doesn't mean you are going to be spot on when it comes to balance.

The balance team mostly does a good job of balancing to be honest. The main gripe people have is it takes AWHILE to fix an overbuff. Graves is starting to finally get close to being balanced. But when he is it will be worth it because he won't be in the dumpster either. Ekko is still broken, but give it another patch or two and I'm sure he will be balanced. Fiora was a broken piece of shit for most of the season and now she's what she always should've been: a late game beast. And not THE late game beast like she was. 

Tldr= while your complaints are justified, give riot some time, they simply take so long to fix things because they do not want to dumpster champions and items

How to nerf ekko

If he dashes and doesn't  AA an enemy champion after the dash he gets a longer CD (nerfs escape)

The base value of his shield is heavily nerfed with the scaling buffed to help focus an AP build and not a tanky build (base value of 50/75/100/125/150 shield)


Lastly he can only use his ult of it will hit an enemy champion (similar to Morgana ult) this stops the using it for a get out of jail free card or an instant return to lane, the ult "position timer" is now reduced by 1 second (I think it was 4 seconds it's now 3)

The second suggestion is horrible. While we're at it, lets only let Malphite ult if it'll hit, or Sion's ult if it hits. 
Everyone has a choice whether or not they should use a long ass CD to secure a kill, or run away. Why take that away from Ekko?

> If he dashes and doesn't AA an enemy champion after the dash he gets a longer CD (nerfs escape)

* Remove dash and increase AA range greatly.
OR
* Lower dash range and increase AA range. 

> The base value of his shield is heavily nerfed with the scaling buffed to help focus an AP build and not a tanky build (base value of 50/75/100/125/150 shield)

The shield is fine really, he has too much utility to not see play as a tank so he should be changed with a diving role as the primary focus.

> Lastly he can only use his ult of it will hit an enemy champion (similar to Morgana ult) this stops the using it for a get out of jail free card or an instant return to lane, the ult "position timer" is now reduced by 1 second (I think it was 4 seconds it's now 3)

Too far.

In addition to dash changes, he should lose the slow on his Q. This means he'll always need to go in to provide his CC.

Additionally, if he procs his passive, his attacks and abilities should re-apply the slow along with the removal of the MS buff. 

This means he has to commit once he starts fighting and his ult will become his only escape method. 

His opponents can then play around forcing him to ult immediately after engaging and Ekko will have to make smart choices about when to go in to a fight.

These changes mean Ekko has to create optimal situations with his kit, rather than having anything in his kit off cooldown be an optimal situation in itself.

Ekko isn't really so much mobile but more of a too much forgiveness, type of thing. An assassin who has heavily influencing CC waas something riot even said they didn't like (hence most cc removal from assassins like the famous silence removals or stun eve going bye bye) But then they release ekko a champ with a large AoE stun, perma-slows(I consider perma-slows hard cc) and an undo button. I'm fine with his kit but his CC needs to get reworked majorily they should remove his passive's slow and his stun dome's slow but allow his stun field to reveal that area from the start of the cast he just needs a lot of cc removal so he can actually be an assassin not some high ratio/base damage bruiser(Hence why I want diana to get a ratio gutting and compensation buffs somewhere)
     Point being assassins should NEVER have this much CC and it was a bad idea by riot to do so even AFTER they said they disliked the idea themselves.

Maokai is actually pretty funny, he only received a buff to sapling duration along with normal melee MR and he came back I honestly didn't expect it. IMO the only nerf maokai needs is returning his MR back to a ranged status since his passive is insane when a mage is near anyways.

Rageblade was an hybrid item not a bruiser item so the change is well welcomed. 
Botrk has never been a bruiser item shifted towards adcs but just heavily nerfed to be a shadow of it's former self so asking for it to be returned isn't correct although I wish the range was reduced back to 450 so ADCs would have to enter a unsafe range to use it or only able to use the active when self-peeling like before the range buff it received. 
Frozen mallet could see a buff to apply on any physical damage then it'd see more play then it can be nerfed in amount for non-AA damage that's it.

Well they did return tiamat so it's just returned to rush tiamat then continue building, don't see an issue with that. As for titanic they should have lowered it's HP but increase it's HP ratio that way those who build it alone wouldn't have so much HP from it alone along with the passive but have to invest into HP to actually get it's passive to work, if that makes sense.

Overall I'm so-so on your views but I do agree that a lot of changes need to be made
